price: Poslije ga je Gospodar njegov izabranikom učinio, pa mu oprostio i na Pravi put ga uputio.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
